A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Extremely disappointing cliched movie. There is very litle character development for Poe and Finn. Did anyone really care  abotu the fight scene between Finn an Phasma? The scenes of Leia  escaping and the entire casino scene both were too comical to enjoy. The character of Luke was complteley unbeleiavable. And then when they brought some life to his character they added a boring ending.  If you want some fun go back and watch The Empire Strikes Back or The Force Awakens. This movie - The Last Jedi is just purposely silly. It could have been worse. They could have resurrected Jar Jar Binks.
